title: FRIDAY 1/29 - Problems in Houston for Deshaun Watson
itunes:title: FRIDAY 1/29 - Problems in Houston for Deshaun Watson
description:
While the Texans have a new head coach in Dan Culley ( 0:40) it looks like he'll not have Deshaun Watson as the star QB has requested a trade (0:11). As for the Super Bowl, all eyes will be on Patrick Mahomes and Tom Brady (1:16), but it's Bucs head coach Bruce Arians that Brady wants to win for (1:39)...as for Mahomes, he's looking to let critics know the Chiefs still have it despite their lack of dominance on the scoreboard this season (3:26). In other news, will Ben Roethlisberger (3:43) be back in Pittsburgh next season? Plus, some outstanding news for Washington head coach Ron Rivera (4:08)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
